statements: DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 5000.00 AND customer_id = 200;

DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE sale_region = 'North' AND sale_amount > 1000.00;

DELETE FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 AND total_price < 500.00;
DELETE FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 2002 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
